fields.label: Any injuries or areas you need to work around?
fields.value: My hand has a fracture which I need to rest for 6 weeks. I had a toothache which left me unable train my jaw which I’d like too

fields.label: What are your key performance goals?
Where do you feel weakest right now?
Do you prefer certain training styles?
fields.value: Explosive circuits with low reps, hate long cardio slogs

fields.label: Do you struggle with any mental blockers or mindset challenges?
fields.value: When I’m under pressure I go autopilot, like I forget the gameplan

fields.label: Are there any parts of your previous plan you hated or loved?
fields.value: I hated long slow runs, loved contrast-style lifting days
